name: RabbitMQ プライオリティキュー
description: 優先度キュー（x-max-priority）を使用する最小例。

files.template:
const amqp = require('amqplib');
(async () => { const conn = await amqp.connect('amqp://localhost'); const ch = await conn.createChannel(); const q = 'prio'; await ch.assertQueue(q, { durable: false, arguments: { 'x-max-priority': 10 } }); ch.sendToQueue(q, Buffer.from('low'), { priority: 1 }); ch.sendToQueue(q, Buffer.from('high'), { priority: 9 }); ch.consume(q, msg => { console.log('got', msg.content.toString()); ch.ack(msg); }); })();
